title: DNA
overview: Murder, manslaughter, tension, emotion and humour... DNA is a series in which female detectives work together with a female prosecutor to solve cases and to find a balance in a far from perfect private life. The murders they investigate are often thrilling and always personal. You will feel the connection with the victim, but also feel some sort of sadness for the offender. They are cases who hit hard and could have happened to you too. Cause hatred, love, jealousy, revenge, anger and greed is a recognisable emotion amongst any of you.
